definitions.text: the quantity a scoop will hold
a hollow concave shape made by removing something
a news report that is reported first by one news organization
examples: he got a scoop on the bribery of city officials

definitions.text: the shovel or bucket of a dredge or backhoe

examples: he used a scoop to serve the ice cream

definitions.text: take out or up with or as if with a scoop
examples: scoop the sugar out of the container
the goal was to best the competition
